name: A House in the Rift
storyline:
You’re thrown into a dimensional rift and end up… wait, is that your parents’ house? And what is that pretty succubus doing here, then? She’s not the last girl you’re going to meet here – your adventures are just beginning. Come say hi!

You’re going to go through exciting storylines and build relationships with a cast of girls who are full of personality.
summary: A HOUSE IN THE RIFT is a sandbox harem game with monthly updates. It’s densely packed and easy to navigate.
